description: Unwind with a peaceful guided meditation session at Münster’s Promenade, perfect for relaxation in the midst of nature.

locationInfo.description: A calm and quiet location around the Promenade, perfect for group meditation to clear your mind while surrounded by trees.
safetyTips: Sit comfortably and find a quiet spot.
Be mindful of noise around the group.

activity: Short Walk at Botanischer Garten Münster
description: Take a brief and relaxing walk around the beautiful Botanischer Garten, enjoying the vibrant flowers and tranquil atmosphere.

locationInfo.description: A serene walk through the Botanischer Garten, where visitors can enjoy the lush greenery and peaceful flower displays.
safetyTips: Take time to enjoy the plants and surroundings.
Keep a safe distance from the flower beds.

description: Capture the charm of Münster’s historic Prinzipalmarkt with your group, creating memories with beautiful photographs.

locationInfo.description: A popular photo opportunity in Münster’s iconic marketplace, surrounded by historic buildings and vibrant city life.
safetyTips: Be aware of pedestrian traffic while taking photos.
Respect the local businesses and other visitors.
Use proper camera settings for bright daylight.

activity: Quick Refreshment Break at Domplatz Café
description: Take a short break with your group at one of the outdoor cafés at Domplatz, enjoying a refreshing drink and the lively atmosphere.

locationInfo.description: A bustling square in the heart of Münster, surrounded by cafés and historical buildings, ideal for a refreshing pit stop.
safetyTips: Keep an eye on personal belongings.
Be courteous to staff and fellow visitors.
Take time to relax and enjoy the city views.

description: Enjoy a short rest while watching some of the animals at Münster’s Allwetterzoo, perfect for animal lovers and a quick group stop.

locationInfo.description: Take a brief break at Allwetterzoo Münster, where you can observe some of the animals before continuing your adventure around the zoo.
safetyTips: Stay with the group and avoid distractions.
Respect the zoo’s rules and regulations.
Be mindful of the animals and their habitats.
